name: protractor-linkuisref-locator
description: A protractor locator that finds anchor elements by their ui-sref attribute.

scripts.test: node app/server.js & ./node_modules/protractor/bin/webdriver-manager update && ./node_modules/protractor/bin/protractor specs/protractorConf.js && kill `lsof -i tcp:3000 -F p | cut -c2-`

author: Fernando Martinez @crzrcn <fernanlink@gmail.com>
